features.feature: Function code is managed using modules. Take advantage of an initialization section.
Parameters given to functions are "Postgres data objects" with interfaces that suite the actual data type.
Never wonder where the exception came from again.
Supports both VPC and Materialization. Optimized Postgres.Cursor returns helps to eliminate Python interpreter overhead.
pg-python can work directly with functions.
Recover from database errors using the "xact()" context manager.
